name: okr-docs

scripts.setup: npm install && echo '✅ npm install complete'
scripts.setup:venv: python3 -m venv vlm_env && source vlm_env/bin/activate && pip install -r vlm_requirements.txt && deactivate && echo '✅ VLM environment ready'
scripts.setup:reranker: python3 -m venv reranker_env && source reranker_env/bin/activate && pip install -r reranker_requirements.txt && deactivate && echo '✅ Reranker environment ready'
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup && npm run setup:venv && npm run setup:reranker && echo '✅ Full setup complete'
scripts.db:setup: psql -U postgres -d vector_db -f lib/rag/schema.sql && echo '✅ Database schema created'

description: This is a [Next.js](https://nextjs.org) project bootstrapped with [`create-next-app`](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/cli/create-next-app).
